revised_title: Papers on Astronomy, Astrophysics, and Electromagnetism
tldr: This article presents a summary of papers read to the Royal Society of London on February 8, 1900. The papers cover topics such as the spectrum of a star, electric touch, molecular changes due to electric waves, and electrification effects of sodium in air and other gases. The research on sodium electrification was suggested by Professor J. J. Thomson and aimed to determine if evaporation of an unelectrified liquid produces any electrification.
